alert.note: Alert for Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Washington County through 630 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Arickaree School, or 21 miles southeast of Akron, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
